website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this flag football helmet comfortable and made to last, it is certified by the International Rugby Board for meeting all of its safety standards.
cons: Only intended for flag football, rugby, or soccer goalies

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I have seizures and black out and this has helped protect my head
customer_reviews.author: Stefani ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: My family used this helmet for are son who is 5, when he is outside playing... he has epilepsy. It allow him to still go outside and play but protect his head if he has a seizure . He love his helmet he can easily put it on and take it off on his own...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The price was great. The materials used to make this helmet are cheap. The padding is extremely hard, the inside is just fabric that makes my son sweat like crazy so he has to take it off, the velcro strap is too big for a small child, and the ventilation wholes on the top are poorly cut and provide close to no ventilation. Spend your money on a quality helmet instead. You get what you pay for. I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Tyiesha Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Sports or Medical
customer_reviews.text: My husband was in a car wreck and had a head injury, which has left him with mobility issues and he falls down often. This helmet, since it is also used in sports has made him not so self concious in wearing and it does a good job of protecting his head from further injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Compliance Queen

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for continuous head protection for the cognitively impaired.
customer_reviews.text: A not My wife suffers from Huntington's Disease and because she is not restrained and suffers from inadequate judgment regarding her own capabilities, she must wear head protection when not accompanied. This means virtually continuous wearing. It wasn't more than a few days before the pictured sore appeared.
customer_reviews.author: jabowery

customer_reviews.title: Not Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Will have to let you know likes later but it fits my Dad's head comfortably and is much better looking than the bulky one given by the Rehab. He uses it to protect his head from further injury since Craniotomy removed a piece of bone from his head. Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: NY'r

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my husband who uses it for jiu jitsu. Previously we had gotten him ear covers to protect his ears from swelling, but the other students would complain that the ear covers hurt them when they would roll with my husband. This padded helmet not only protects my husband's ears, but the other students aren't complaining about it because it doesn't hurt them. And in fact, they are considering getting this helmet as well. The price point is really good for this too.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Kekahuna

customer_reviews.title: fall protection
customer_reviews.text: My friend has a problem with falls. This has stopped her from getting stitches a few times. She wears it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  from Syracuse

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected and as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for an elderly person to protect against head injuries temporarily until we can order a proper medical helmet. It's not really adequate to protect an adult from standing fall head injuries, but is erving the purpose temporarily, especially for sleeping. While awake we are using a bike helmet until we can get the proper medical helmets made specifically for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: stevefoobar

customer_reviews.title: Elitetek Soft Padded Headgear Size XS fits 20.5" head circumference perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Elitetek Soft Padded Headgear Size XS fits 20.5" head circumference perfectly at minimum size adjustment with room to grow too. Downside = My kid hates the strap on the neck. I ordered Cliff Keen chin straps and will rig them onto this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: shinyhalo

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is lightweight but offers enough support. Looks better than the helmet with the holes that we were getting made at children’s hospital. I use this helmet for my 13 year old son that has seizures. The price was affordable and shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Billison

customer_reviews.title: Consider other options
customer_reviews.text: -when comparing this one to what we viewed from the rest of the team we were dissatisfied. This chin straps on both small and medium should be able to make tighter. Was tempted to rig, season was only six weeks though. -secondly wasn’t a fan of how helmets couldn’t be made made much more tight with that little bit of Velcro. Overall, I wish I knew more about these helmets before making a decision. Look at the kind with lace holes for a safer fit. Used for 6 and 9 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my sons football season. Much cheaper than what I would have paid through other companies and it was better than some that other parents had bought . Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Best looking choice
customer_reviews.text: My specialist told me to wear a helmet outside since I fall too much, recently had two head injuries. This works great and is the best looking choice.
customer_reviews.author: geekrva

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I work in the auto industry, repairing cars, and have had my share Of hood stays loosing pressure especially in colder months, and working under the cars and trucks It has saved me a few lumps and cuts
customer_reviews.author: CeoBred

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Got this helmet for my cheerleader to wear when practicing new stunts. She said she feels like a nerd wearing it, but it’s comfortable and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Aunster

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple sports
customer_reviews.text: My son is using this for a 7x7 football league. It's only touch football so no need for full helmets. He likes the fit and says the helmet is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Softening the impact.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for medical helmet, actually works very well. This is secondary for when my husband does not need the hard style of helmet
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: great, lightweight helmet for water sports
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is adjustable and light weight...it floats as well and you can hear through it. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stephen Rush

customer_reviews.title: Such a blessing for my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: It fits very well and it so more easy to put on. But most of all the coverage on the forehead is just a blessing. He wears it and doesn’t seem to mind it on.
customer_reviews.author: Thresia conrad

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awsome kept my uncle head safe when he fell down when he have a random seizure
customer_reviews.author: Rovaldus

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product - Outstanding Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Got this padded helmet for head protection playing adult flag football (semi tackle). After seeing the product, I don't think it will provide adequate protection and returned it to seller. I'm giving them 4 stars because customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: JS 91362

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, allows superior vision and looks tough.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cap for high speed rugby, I can’t say enough about style and effectiveness for the player.
customer_reviews.author: Gottagontherun

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably protected
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how comfortable and durable this helmet is. Looking forward to wearing it during my flag football games.
customer_reviews.author: Lonzell

customer_reviews.title: I use this for having seizures and falling frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Great for person that falls a lot or has seizures.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: get it!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. Even better is their customer service when you have questions. Buy from them!
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Product came . Expected the padding to be a little thicker but you get what you pay for lol
customer_reviews.author: crystal payne

customer_reviews.title: Padded helmet protector
customer_reviews.text: Great for my little toddler who of which acts on her tantrums.
customer_reviews.author: Vhill

customer_reviews.title: Great for flag players!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr wears this for flag practice & games. It is comfortable & washes well
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as an interior helmet to a larger helmet that we have. Works well with cushioning
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied costumer ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and perfect item as described. I will recommend this to whoever is looking for one like it.
customer_reviews.author: Karismatic_First

customer_reviews.title: It’s funny looking but kinda cool
customer_reviews.text: Works good for bjj, wish the chin strap could get a little tighter but it works I use it to keep my hair safe (use with a headband) but it also keeps my ears protected from cauliflower and protection from random elbows
customer_reviews.author: alex santana

customer_reviews.title: purchased it for my mother n law,
customer_reviews.text: we are using this for a mother n law that is starting to fall a lot, she hit her head and now she feels safer and not tied down
customer_reviews.author: david w.

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet for jiujitsu
customer_reviews.text: I use it for jiujitsu because I don’t want my hair to get caught and pulled on the mats. It works fine, however the velcro strap and the chin is terrible for jiujitsu. It’s worth it still and I’ll probably fix it myself but I’d keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: desentila

customer_reviews.title: All Around Nice
customer_reviews.text: Right on time delivery. Perfect fit, looks great. He LOVES this headgear. Will update after first game at the end of the month.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz KB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and protection for sports related activities
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son uses this for Flag Football. I bought him a small and it fits him perfectly. Good quality material and the Velcro straps are easy for him to adjust without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Neenz

customer_reviews.title: Dementia patient who falls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for mum who has dementia and was having multiple fall injuries. She wears it everyday and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: margied

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and feel. Easily adjustable, probably a 2 inch adjustment range.
customer_reviews.author: steve taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, great padding and great price! my son is a soccer goalkeeper and he loves this helmet! And I love the fact that he's protected.
customer_reviews.author: Zeni

customer_reviews.title: Good for it’s purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great for our daughter with seizures. A little large but it does the job for our 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I had two craniotomies I had to be away for my dogs for two weeks. so I wore this when I came back home and could be with them. It is 100% wonderful and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry😀😁
customer_reviews.text: Use as a safety helmet to replace a hard hat. Works very well for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Troell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot bigger than what they say. I would have returned it but I missed the 30 day return window as I was dealing with my cancer reoccurrence.
customer_reviews.author: Me so Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it and never complains. 5 stars for me
customer_reviews.author: Volsconti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect!!!!!! We like it a lot and great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price is reasonable enough that you can buy more then one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter suffer from seizures. This is light and not bulky and doesnt bring attention to her. The bulky helmet makes her feel uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Works for a deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: Works kid hates it but keeps her from banging her head.
customer_reviews.author: Madmike

customer_reviews.title: Too Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Terrible fabric. Hard. May as well wear a football helmet with a bath towel inside.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLaM

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great! Velcro front and back makes it easier to fit .
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Protection
customer_reviews.text: My nephew recently had a severe trauma and another fall would be dangerous. This product has given him both protection and confidence to begin the long process of rehab. Really comfortable and easy to wash...highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: LINDSAY M CLARKE

customer_reviews.title: Chin strap
customer_reviews.text: The chin strap should be adjustable. Other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Daisy C.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the feel and look it hurt my ears but overall it did its job.
customer_reviews.author: David Clark

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Did not like product was not what is said no pairing for people with epilepsy as it stated it was
customer_reviews.author: michelle hughes

product_meta.title: EliteTek Soft Padded Headgear - 7v7 Soft Shell - Rugby - Flag Football Helmet - Soccer Goalie & Epilepsy Head Fall Protection - Youth & Adult Sizing
product_meta.description:
EliteTek Soft Padded Headgear

New improved soft shelled helmet design with velcro strap for easy use. Added vent holes for breath-ability and enhanced stitching for durability. Youth and Adult Sizes: We provide sizes for the smallest ballers on the gridiron to the biggest playmakers (High School/College).

QUALITY GUARANTEED

You don't have to buy "name brand" to get a quality product. We stand by our products with a money back guarantee. We believe in providing a great product at an affordable price.

CUSTOMER SERVICE

As a small business based in San Diego, California USA we are built on customer service. We will always respond within 1 business day, and typically within 1 hour. Just contact us for any questions, exchanges or returns. Customer service matters! Email office@EliteTek.com
feature_bullets: ✅ QUALITY PROVEN: 7 on 7, Rugby scrum cap, Flag Football, Passing Leagues, Soccer Goalie Helmet, and Head Fall Protection for Epilepsy. Protects against cuts and abrasions. Check our reviews, we stand by our helmets. No questions asked return policy.

✅ QUICK FITTING: Fast and Secure Velcro fitting system = STRAP UP & GO! No more clumsy strings to tie, EliteTek's new design is the fastest fitting and most secure on the market. We stand by our custom designed product. UNITED STATES BUSINESS. Customer Service is what we are built on.

✅ TEAM LOGO READY: Side panels were designed to allow 3" x 3" custom team LOGO printing. This soft shelled helmet is ready to take to your local printer for logo heat press. We designed the helmet to have a prominent side area to show your team spirit.

✅ IRB CERTIFIED: Certified by International Rugby Board thru stringent testing to meet World Rugby Standards. Our EliteTek headgear is one of the only helmets on the market to be featured on the World Rugby Approved Equipment List. This helmet is approved for full contact Rugby.

✅ SIZING: SEE SIZE CHART IN PHOTOS SECTION. Measure completely around your forehead at the fullest part pulling the tape measure snug. The tape should be about ½” above each ear. XS= 19 to 21 inches (48-53 cm), S= 21 - 22 inches (53- 56 cm), M= 22 - 23 inches (56-58 cm), L= 23 - 24 inches (58-61 cm), XL= 24+ inches (61+ cm)
